Class Member

  • java.lang.Object
    • Member

  • public class Member
extends java.lang.Object
    A shopper of the Store

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Member()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finalisePurchases()
      Finishes this Member's shopping, charges their account (via System.out.println), and clears their basket.
      void returnProduct(Product product, int quantity)
      Removes a number of a product from this Member's basket and returns it to the global inventory.
      void selectProduct(Product product, int quantity)
      Takes a number of a product from the global inventory and adds it to this Member's basket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Member

        public Member()
        Default constructor. Throws no exceptions.

    • Method Detail

      • selectProduct

        public void selectProduct(Product product,
                          int quantity)
        Takes a number of a product from the global inventory and adds it to this Member's basket.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be selected. May not be null.
        quantity - The number of units of the product to be selected. Must be 1 or more.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the global inventory does not have the required amount of Product.

      • returnProduct

        public void returnProduct(Product product,
                          int quantity)
        Removes a number of a product from this Member's basket and returns it to the global inventory.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be returned.
        quantity - The number of units of the product to be returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Member's basket does not contain the required amount of Product.

      • finalisePurchases

        public void finalisePurchases()
        Finishes this Member's shopping, charges their account (via System.out.println), and clears their basket. Note: testing this method is more complicated than it might seem at first. StackOverflow will likely have some suggestions for you. You cannot refactor this method (even though it would be the best solution).
